bio.heading: Ryan Jackson
bio.quote: I believe AI should amplify human potential, not replace it. My mission is to make cutting-edge AI education approachable and actionable — for everyone from Honolulu to Tokyo.

newsletter.heading: Join the Wave
newsletter.description: Join 1,000+ entrepreneurs learning AI the HonuVibe way. Weekly insights, tutorials, and community highlights.

one.quote: HonuVibe completely changed how I think about AI in my business. The community is incredibly supportive and Ryan's teaching style makes complex concepts feel approachable.
one.name: Sarah K.

two.quote: The bilingual approach is a game-changer. I finally found an AI community that bridges the gap between US innovation and the Japanese market.
two.name: Takeshi M.

three.quote: I built and launched my first SaaS product within two months of joining. The hands-on approach and real project focus sets HonuVibe apart from every other AI course.
three.name: Marcus L.

hero.heading: HonuHub Waikiki
hero.sub: A dedicated learning space in the heart of Waikiki — where AI education meets island inspiration.

about.heading: Where Learning Meets Aloha
about.description: HonuHub is the physical heart of HonuVibe.AI — a premium learning space in Waikiki that functions as a classroom, conference room, and innovation lab. Whether you're joining in person or streaming from anywhere in the world, HonuHub brings the energy of Hawaii to every learning experience.
about.description_2: Equipped with professional AV equipment, high-speed internet, and a collaborative atmosphere, HonuHub is designed to make AI education tangible, social, and inspiring.

in_person.title: In-Person Training
in_person.description: Hands-on workshops and seminars in our Waikiki space. Small groups, direct instructor access, and collaborative learning.

conference.title: Conference & Collaboration
conference.description: Book HonuHub for team offsites, corporate training sessions, or collaborative AI sprints. Flexible setup for your needs.

remote.title: Remote Live Streaming
remote.description: Every HonuHub session is streamed live and recorded. Join from anywhere with a remote ticket and full interaction access.

sessions.heading: What's Happening at HonuHub
sessions.sub: Browse upcoming in-person and remote sessions. All sessions are recorded for later access.
sessions.coming_soon: New sessions are being planned. Check back soon or subscribe to our newsletter for updates.

remote.heading: Remote Access to HonuHub
remote.description: Can't make it to Waikiki? No problem. All HonuHub sessions are streamed live with full interaction — Q&A, polls, and breakout rooms. Plus, every session is recorded so you can watch on your schedule.

cta.heading: Have a Project in Mind?
cta.sub: Whether it's a passion project or a business challenge, we'd love to hear about it.

paragraphs.p1: Born and raised in Hawaii, I grew up surrounded by a culture that values community, connection, and giving back. Those values shaped everything I do today — including how I approach AI education.
paragraphs.p2: After years of building AI products and leading engineering teams, I realized something was missing from the education landscape: practical, human-centered AI learning that bridges cultures and empowers entrepreneurs.
paragraphs.p3: HonuVibe was born from that gap. It's my mission to make cutting-edge AI education approachable and actionable — for everyone from Honolulu to Tokyo.

philosophy.quote: Leveraging AI to foster entrepreneurship, learning, and better business practices.
philosophy.description: I believe AI should amplify human potential, not replace it. Every course, project, and community interaction at HonuVibe is designed with this principle at its core.

work.heading: Selective by Design
work.description: I take on a small number of passion projects and high-impact engagements each year. If you want to work together, I'd love to hear from you.

hero.heading: Better Together
hero.sub: A global community of entrepreneurs, builders, and curious minds — united by AI and aloha.

about.heading: More Than a Course — A Community
about.description: The HonuVibe community lives on Skool — a space where members share wins, ask questions, collaborate on projects, and support each other's AI journeys. Whether you're launching your first SaaS or exploring AI for the first time, you belong here.
about.description_2: Weekly live sessions, project showcases, and direct access to Ryan and fellow practitioners make this the most active bilingual AI community online.

one.quote: Within 3 months of joining, I automated 80% of my reporting workflow and started freelancing AI consulting on the side.
one.name: Yuki T.

two.quote: The community helped me go from zero coding experience to launching a working SaaS product. The support is unreal.
two.name: David R.

three.quote: Finding a bilingual AI community that actually builds things was a game-changer for my career transition.
three.name: Akiko M.

probono.heading: Giving Back
probono.description: Every quarter, the HonuVibe community takes on a pro-bono project for a nonprofit or community organization. It's our way of practicing the Aloha Standard — using our skills to make a real difference.
probono.featured: Featured: CoralWatch Hawaii — helping volunteer teams monitor coral reef health with a custom data collection app.

hero.heading: Apply to Work with Ryan
hero.sub: I work with a small number of partners each year on projects that genuinely excite me — or where I believe I can make a measurable difference. If that sounds like you, tell me about your vision.

privacy_page.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.intro: HonuVibe.AI ("we", "us", or "our") respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you voluntarily provide when you register, make a purchase, subscribe to our newsletter, fill out a form, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, billing information, and any other information you choose to provide.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide and maintain our services, process transactions, send communications about courses and events, improve our website and user experience, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and services (such as payment processors, email providers, and analytics services), subject to confidentiality agreements.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings. For more information, see our Cookie Notice.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of marketing communications at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@honuvibe.ai.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a new effective date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@honuvibe.ai.

terms_page.heading: Terms of Service
terms_page.intro: These Terms of Service govern your use of HonuVibe.AI website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

use.title: Use of Services
use.content: You may use our services for lawful purposes only. You agree not to misuse our services, interfere with their operation, or attempt to access them using unauthorized methods.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

payments.title: Payments & Refunds
payments.content: Course and session purchases are processed through Stripe. Refund requests must be made within 14 days of purchase. Digital content that has been accessed is generally non-refundable.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on HonuVibe.AI — including courses, videos, text, graphics, and software — is owned by HonuVibe or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our permission.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee specific outcomes from using our courses or services.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, HonuVibe shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to our services at our discretion, with or without notice, for any violation of these terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the State of Hawaii, USA, without regard to conflict of law principles.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at legal@honuvibe.ai.

cookies_page.heading: Cookie Notice
cookies_page.intro: This Cookie Notice explains how HonuVibe.AI uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember your preferences and improve your experience.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly (authentication, security, language preferences). Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site (Plausible Analytics — privacy-focused, no personal data collected). Preference Cookies: Remember your settings such as theme preference (dark/light mode) and language selection.

third_party.title: Third-Party Cookies
third_party.content: We use minimal third-party services. Plausible Analytics does not use cookies and respects Do Not Track. Payment processing through Stripe may set cookies required for transaction security.

control.title: Managing Cookies
control.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies.

changes.title: Changes to This Notice
changes.content: We may update this Cookie Notice as our practices change. Updates will be posted on this page with a revised date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Questions about our cookie practices? Contact us at privacy@honuvibe.ai.
